Doc: Acknowledged. If you want my opinion, though, I'd think we better
get =
moving.

***

Still reflecting, Dinobot was considering what to do. Of cour=
se, he
could remain true to his word... And yet, so much was at stake. He
r=
emembered Optimus Primal. If those Maximals were anything like him,
they wo=
uld try to parley first. He then thought of Depthcharge and
Rattrap. What t=
o expect? Well, the first thing was surely not to scare
them... and seeing =
how people had fled when the alarm broke out, that
was a bad start.

if we

ld move that minion
back to

but I've learned from

head map with

seus

should

cted

eam will be supported by our loyal troopers, however you
may be
> called up=
on to assist if for some reason the base comes under fire."
>

nd 2 will leave via the tunnel down by the detention facility,

o one will see us leave the base and we can leave the
shields up.
> We need=
 to make sure no one sees us leave.

ront, and team 2 will position
themselves
> so that they can cover us."

the bo=
t.
> If he chooses violence, he will need to get through all of us before
h=
e gets
> up the ramp into the city."
> 
> "And we all know the mission goal=
s, we can change the strategy as
conditions
> change.  Any questions?"
